casebody.data:
No. 09-1061 (R46-025). Novell, Inc., Petitioner v. The SCO Group, Inc. 561 U.S. 1051, 131 S. Ct. 51,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1141,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5683. August 26, 2010.

The petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit in the above-entitled case was dismissed today pursuant to Rule 46 of the Rules of this Court.

Same case below, 578 F.3d 1201.
